name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

videoCollection.title: Genshin Impact Story Teaser: We Will Be Reunited (Contains spoilers)
Story Teaser: Promise of a People's Dream | Genshin Impact

customize.text:
500 years ago, the government of a godless nation broke the foundations of the world, causing the forces of the Abyss to invade Teyvat. The Heavenly Principles sent many Archons to Khaenri'ah to fight the Abyss, and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.
All pure-blooded Khaenri'ahn were cursed with immortality, and the impure-bloods were transformed into monsters.

customize.name: Durin
customize.desc: The Shadow Dragon and one of Rhinedottir's children.

customize.text: appeared in Mondstadt during the Cataclysm. He poisoned the land and brought death to the region. Durin was defeated by the Anemo Archon and the elemental dragon

customize.name: Dvalin
customize.desc: An Elemental Dragon and the Anemo Archon Barbatos's friend. After being poisoned by the Shadow Dragon's blood, he became known as Stormterror.

customize.text: . Many warriors died in the fight with the Abyss.
The Abyss had broken through in the Chasm, and the Milleliths and Yaksha

customize.name: Bosacius
customize.desc: Leader of The Yakshas, also known as Marshal Vritras.

customize.text: went to fight the monsters. At the cost of their lives, Yaksha and the mortal Boyang sealed the monsters in the depths with the Fantastic Compass.

customize.name: Makoto
customize.desc: Raiden Ei's twin sister and the previous Electro Archon, also known as Baal. She died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text: went to Khaenri'ah where she was slain. A lot of warriors died, and the land was corrupted. To cleanse the land of the filth, branches of the Sacred Sakura were broken off and planted, which collect corruption. Once every 60 years, a ritual is performed to cleanse the Sacred Sakura.

customize.name: Rukkhadevata
customize.desc: The Goddess of Wisdom, the previous Dendro Archon, and a friend of Nabu Malikata and King Deshret. She was completely erased from Irminsul to save it from forbidden knowledge.

customize.name: Irminsul
customize.desc: Irminsul can be thought of as a large tree growing downwards rather than upwards, containing all the knowledge and wisdom of the world from ancient times to the present. Ley Lines, like the roots of Irminsul, cross the earth, absorbing the memories of the world.

customize.text: against the forbidden knowledge. Rukkhadevata died due to the infection. A hollow formed in Tunigi, through which monsters of the Abyss entered. The Hydro Archon

customize.name: Egeria
customize.desc: The previous Hydro Archon who died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text:
was sent to the breach and died in battle.
The commander of the royal guard,

customize.name: Dainsleif
customize.desc: A former captain of the Khaenri'ahn Royal Guard, who was cursed by Celestia with immortality.

customize.name: Zurvan
customize.desc: A Pari born in the Vourukasha Oasis, Zurvan is known to be The First Pari.

customize.text:
, and the Traveler's twin, fought near the hollow with the Abyss.
The Khaenri'ahn Marshal Regent, along with the Schwanenritter, defended Sumeru with the help of Ruin Golems because Khaenri'ah was located under Sumeru.

customize.name: Elynas
customize.desc: An Abyssal beast that appeared in Fontaine 500 years ago during the Cataclysm. Elynas is the "Father" of all Melusines.

customize.text: appeared in Fontaine during the Cataclysm, poisoning the water and land. Many people died in the battle with Elynas. When the creature realized that it was only causing destruction, it gave up and died. Due to the contamination of Fontaine's water, Egeria's familiars,

customize.name: Oceanids
customize.desc: Oceanids are intelligent Hydro lifeforms created by the previous Hydro Archon, Egeria, and are able to manipulate water at will. All the people of Fontaine were once Oceanids, whom Egeria had turned into humans to satisfy their wishes, going against the will of the Heavenly Principles.

customize.text:
The Cataclysm started the decomposition of the Ley Lines in Natlan, which had already been damaged during the battle between the Heavenly Principles and the dragons. Some of the Khaenri'ahn warriors, including the First Fatui Harbinger Capitano, fought on Natlan's side against the Abyss.
After the Cataclysm, Natlan had about 500 years left before the nation would be completely destroyed, so the Pyro Archon Mavuika created a plan to use the powers of the divine throne to destroy the Abyss when Natlan's time came.
